wqal alrajul almumin min al fireawn lifireawn wamalayih waezana wmhdhrana: 'iiniy 'akhaf ealaykum 'iin qutiltum mwsa, mithl yawm al'ahzab aladhin thzzabu ealaa anbyayhm
